text: Dennis L Hartmann is an American atmospheric scientist at the University of Washington. He has done research on ozone depletion and climate change. In 2016 he was elected to the National Academy of Sciences.. He is a Revelle Medal committee member. ==References== ==External links== * Category:American atmospheric scientists Category:Princeton University alumni Category:University of Washington faculty Category:Members of the United States National Academy of Sciences Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Dennis L. Hartmann
